name: Prowlarr
short_description: Unified indexer manager for both Usenet and BitTorrent with PVR app integration.
description: Prowlarr is an indexer manager that supports both Usenet and BitTorrent trackers. It acts as a central hub connecting your PVR apps (Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, Readarr, Sailarr) to both Usenet indexers and BitTorrent trackers through a unified API. Unlike Jackett which only supports BitTorrent, Prowlarr handles both protocols. Features include support for 80+ Usenet indexers, BitTorrent tracker integration via Torznab/Cardigann, indexer health monitoring, RSS sync, seeding requirements per indexer, and authentication handling. It's the successor to both NZBHydra2 and Jackett.
usecases: Manage all your Usenet and BitTorrent indexers in one place.
Connect Sonarr/Radarr to both Usenet and torrent sources.
Monitor which indexers are working and which are down.
Auto-discover new releases across all your indexers.
notes: Supports both Usenet (NZB) and BitTorrent protocols
Single API key for all your PVR apps to use
